DESCRIPTION.FULL: One or more files were excluded from the package because they are located in excluded paths. Missing files can cause unexpected application failures.

RESOLUTION.FULL: To add an excluded file to the package, do the following: 1) Remove the path from the exclusion list using the sequencer options page. 2) Add the file using the Virtual File System Tab in the sequencer and resave the package.

DESCRIPTION.FULL: Running other applications during creation of a virtual package can interfere with the process by accessing files that need to be added to the virtual package or adding extraneous data to the virtual package.

RESOLUTION.FULL: Close all other running applications by using Task Manager or exiting the applications' window.

MOREINFO.DESCRIPTION: The following applications should be closed:
